input.sentences: i spent all week on my costume and i showed up at the party ready .
there were a lot of other people there .
everyone wanted to take a picture of my costume .
everyone was very impressed with it .
afterward there was a fight over my costume .
output.sentences: It was that time of the year again.
And the clowns roam the night.
By the end of the night, everyone is drunk and happy.
